notification_updates_message.message: No action is requiredâ€”continue browsing the web without annoying ads! See what's new

updates_update_i1_description.message: Should your ABP settings become corrupted due to a browser issue, the notification message now opens in a new browser tab.

updates_update_i2_description.message: Help spread the word about your favorite ad blocker by sharing the total number of ads that you've blocked on your favorite social media channels.

updates_update_i2_title.message: Added option to share number of ads blocked on social media

updates_update_i3_description.message: Long filters can now be viewed in their entirety, including the CSS selector.

updates_update_i3_title.message: Expanded the length of developer tools panel tooltip

updates_update_i4_description.message: The icon now blinks and turns blue to alert users of notifications.

updates_update_i4_title.message: Made ABP taskbar icon notifications more obvious and distinguishable
